application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: New York, NY, USA; Cambridge, MA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA
description:
The Google Cloud Healthcare and Life Sciences (HCLS) team is building products that will enable our customers to transform healthcare. Our job is to help communicate the product value to internal and external audiences. This means making our product value propositions real through the creation of product narratives and collateral, technology showcases and hands-on experiences, and scaling our messages and technical content through a range of different channels.

In this role, you will be responsible for driving the product marketing for a number of Google Cloud HCLS products. You'll work closely with the HCLS product, solutions, and marketing teams to determine Go-to-Market strategy (e.g. positioning, naming, pricing, competitive analyses) and create the assets to support our Sales teams. This role will focus on products designed for the ingestion and storage of healthcare specific data, including critical functions such as de-identification.

Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of technology or software marketing experience.
  • Experience building sales collateral, creative assets and other marketing content, as well as experience presenting and delivering strategic and technical presentations.
  • Experience working with clinical data, biomedical research, telehealth, digital health, or healthcare data management technologies.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA degree or Master's degree in Engineering.
  • Experience planning and executing marketing programs.
  • Experience launching products and building global scale campaigns.
  • Experience working as a product advocate or technology advocate.
  • Track record of working collaboratively across multiple Engineering, Product Management and Marketing teams.
responsibilities:
• Define, prioritize and land the go-to-market strategy for multiple healthcare products.
  • Collaborate with other marketing, product management, partnerships, sales and engineering functions to define and deliver technology value propositions, marketing narratives and core marketing content.
  • Drive awareness of our healthcare specific products in the marketplace. Identify opportunities to partner and integrate healthcare-specific products with core Google Cloud Platform products.
  • Design innovative marketing campaign strategies and partner with product and engineering to develop and/or deliver product demonstrations for major events, including executive keynotes.
  • Manage and provide regular reporting on marketing key performance indicators and metrics.
title: Product Marketing Manager, Google Cloud Healthcare
